com.excilys.cdb.ui

Class Util

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.excilys.cdb.ui.Util

  • public class Util
extends java.lang.Object
    The Util class is used to check the validity of the user input The input is retrieved as a String and returned as the valid format
    • a valid id (int)
    • a valid LocalDateTime
    • a valid Company
    It also checks if a query has succeeded or not
    Author:
    sclaudet
